title: Daniel Craig is almost unrecognisable in first look of Logan Lucky | hollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Daniel Craig is almost unrecognisable in first look of Logan Lucky 
A first look image of Daniel Craig in Steven Soderbergh’s Logan Lucky has been released. hollywood Updated: Feb 17, 2017 18:24 IST AFP Logan Lucky will hit screens on April 18. 
Director Steven Soderbergh’s upcoming action film Logan Lucky has been given a release date as well as a first look image. 
The star-studded movie, which features a cast including Daniel Craig, Channing Tatum, Hilary Swank, Adam Driver and Seth MacFarlane, will hit cinema screens on August 18, Variety reports. Read more There’s no other job like it: Daniel Craig changes mind, hints at 5th Bond film 
Driver and Tatum take on the leading roles of two brothers attempting an elaborate robbery. Rebecca Blunt penned the screenplay. Actor Daniel Craig poses for photographers on the red carpet at the German premiere of the new James Bond 007 film Spectre. 
The film marks Soderbergh’s return as a feature film director after he announced his retirement around 2013. He later clarified that the ‘retirement’ would instead be more along the lines of a 5-year sabbatical. 
Follow @htshowbiz for more
